overview: Davi is a young black man of 22 years, living in the periphery, Sapopemba region. In October 2019 he started working as a Telemarketing Operator. In 2020, the company “Crê-Crédito”, before the Quarantine determined by the Government, due to the outbreak of COVID-19, began the work of SAC (Customer Service Services), inside the Home Office, for disease prevention and for the good health of its employees. The routine of fictitious consultations, showing what it is like to face the quarantine, being independent and living alone, a young artist independent of the HIP HOP movement, in terms of improvised rhyme and other performances such as Dance.
title: Advisor
